com.here.mobility.sdk.sensorawareness.ppoi

Class PpoiFeature

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.mobility.sdk.sensorawareness.ppoi.PpoiFeature

  • public class PpoiFeature
extends java.lang.Object
    Determines the user's Personal Points Of Interest (work, home, others). The workflow is as follows:
    1. The Personal Points Of Interest (PPOI) feature is activated and starts collecting data.
    2. As more data is collected and analyzed, the user's PPOIs are determined with varying accuracy and confidence. The PPOIs can be retrieved via PpoiClient.
    3. Once the accuracy and confidence are sufficient (or we give up on increasing them), the data collection is stopped.
    In order to activate the PPOI discovery, you must have location permissions. See the location permissions documentation on how to obtain them. Note that even if your app has location permissions when you activate the feature, it is possible for the user to revoke them later. If this happens, PpoiFeature will deactivate itself. It is therefore recommended to call PpoiFeature.isActive(android.content.Context) to check whether the discovery is still active.
